svgMulliganStatusText: You Make the Play: Keep or Mulligan?
keepOrMulliganAfterText: Do you keep this or ship it?
Do you gamble and keep, or mulligan and play it safe?
What do you do with this?
keepOrMulliganBeforeText: It's game #gameNumber# and you're on the #playOrDraw#. You mulligan your first hand but draw another 7 cards anyway. Your new hand is:
You’re playing against #opposingDeck#, game #gameNumber#, on the draw. Your hand is:

[_aboveTextSize:20px]You're playing Team Limited with #limitedDeckDescription#. Your deck is not very aggressive, but your opponent’s deck is better than yours and you feel that [#somePronoun#]#theirs# has more late-game power, so you side in cards like #cardAlone# and try to go aggressive game 2. Your mana is OK but not great: you have a #landCategory# and two [_land:#landCategory#,#realLandCard#]#_land.s#, you think. For game 3, on the draw, this is your hand:
You’re playing #_format# #deck#. It's game #gameNumber# on the draw against #opposingDeck#. This is your hand:
You’re on the #playOrDraw# against #opposingDeck#, and it’s game #gameNumber#. This is your draw:
It's the start of [_round:Round #num1-9#,day two]#_round# at #tournament#, and you're matched against #opposingDeck#. Your hand is:
You’re playing #deckVariation# against #opposingDeck# at #event# (old #_format#). Your opener:
You’re playing #deck# in #_format# and you know your opponent is playing #deckVariation#. It’s game 1. You're on the #playOrDraw#, and your hand is:
You’re playing #_format# with #deckVariation# (basically a #deck# deck but with #cardAlone#). You’re on the #playOrDraw# against #opposingDeck#. Your hand is:

You’re playing #deckVariation# in #_format# and you’re on the  #playOrDraw#. You don’t know what your opponent is playing, but you’re currently in the #bracket# bracket (you [_outcome:won,lost,drew,conceded,got a game loss,got a match loss,lost your #gameAccessory#,took a nap,broke a sleeve]#_outcome# last round and so did [#somePronoun#]#they#). Your opening hand is:

[_aboveTextSize:20px]You’re playing a #multicolor# #creatureTypes#-based deck in #cardSet# Draft. [_baseColor:#basicColors#]Your deck is base-#_baseColor# and your mana is 1#num0-9# #basicLands#, #num1-5# [_otherLands:#basicLands#,#limitedLands#]#_otherLands#, [_n:1,1,2]#_n# #realLandCard#. 1#num0-9# of your cards are #_baseColor#, with two of those being [_multiplier:double,double,triple]#_multiplier#-#_baseColor#. Your deck is [_rating:above average,below average,average,amazing,good,bad,a trainwreck,a steaming pile of garbage]#_rating# (a #num0-9#-#num0-9# deck). You’re on the #playOrDraw# against #opposingDeck#. Your opening hand is:
